text: Cruz Verde Airport is an airport serving the city of Ibagué, in the Tolima Department of Colombia. The runway is south of Perales Airport, the city's main airport, and runs alongside Picaleña Avenue (Avenida Picaleña). The Ibague VOR-DME (Ident: IBG) and non-directional beacon (Ident: IBG) are located east-northeast of the field.IBG NDBIBG VOR ==See also== * * *Transport in Colombia *List of airports in Colombia ==References== ==External links== *OpenStreetMap - Cruz Verde *FallingRain - Cruz Verde Category:Airports in Colombia Category:Colombia transport-related lists
